/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, providing a driver's eye view of the scene. The street is flanked by lush green trees and bushes, adding a touch of nature to the urban landscape. Tall street lamps stand sentinel along the road, their presence hinting at the transformation of the scene as day turns to night. The sky above is a clear blue, dotted with fluffy white clouds, casting a serene backdrop to the busy street below.
